metadata.name: Dragons and Tyans NFT TRAILER [The Beginning]
metadata.description: I present to your attention the trailer for the collection Dragons and Tyans. The collection was created by 3D artist nottodayrender. The soundtrack for the video was created by music producer MadCat (Dom Production). The collection will be filled with 3D models and animations of stylized dragons and anime girls. Each model is an individual and unique character with its own history. In this scene you will see a dragon named Shenron and a girl named Selia who lives among the clouds. You can also find videos on the nottodayrender channel. HD quality will be sent upon request. I hope you will like it.
